meaningMnemonic: Because the hiragana ends with an う sound, you know this word is a verb. The kanji itself means <kanji>cultivate</kanji> and the verb vocab version means <vocabulary>to cultivate</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: You have <reading>two chee</reading>se <reading>ca</reading>rs (つちか) that are growing mold. But that's a good thing, because it's the good kind of cheese mold. So, you cultivate the mold on these two cheese cars, comparing the difference between the two.
